biotools.summary: SQUARNA is a tool for RNA secondary structure prediction. It can take a single RNA sequence or an alignment of sequences as input. SQUARNA handles pseudoknots and can predict alternative structures. SQUARNA allows structural restraints and chemical probing data as additional input and is available at https://github.com/febos/SQUARNA.
